Prop.Name: Type
Prop.Description: Data elements contain the relevant information provided by the query, while Axes elements slice and dice that information.

Prop.Name: VisibleDeprecated
Prop.Description: True if the element appears in the selected output (Card, Chart, Pivot Table or Table). Invisible elements are still accessible through code, i.e. in the ItemClick event.

Prop.Name: Visible
Prop.Description: Yes, if the element appears in the selected output (Card, Chart, Pivot Table or Table). No, if the element doesn't appear in the selected output but it can be displayed by selecting it. Never, if the element never appears (invisible elements are still accessible through code, i.e. in the ItemClick event).

Depend.Cond: (value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or (value(QueryElementType) == Datum)))

(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementOrderType) != Custom) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or (value(QueryElementType) == Datum))))
(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or (value(QueryElementType) == Datum)))

(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or ((value(QueryElementType) == Datum) or (value(QueryElementAxisType) == Page))))
(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or (value(QueryElementType) == Axis)))

(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or ((value(QueryElementType) == Datum) or (value(QueryElementAxisType) == Page))))

(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or ((value(QueryElementType) == Datum) or (value(QueryElementAxisType) == Page))))

(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or ((value(QueryElementType) == Datum) or (value(QueryElementAxisType) == Page))))
(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementExpandCollapse) != ExpandSomeValues) or ((value(QueryElementType) == Datum) or (value(QueryElementAxisType) == Page)))
(value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or (value(QueryElementType) == Axis)))

Prop.Name: Show values as
Prop.Description: Displays the values according to the selected calculation.

Prop.Name: Average type
Prop.Description: Type of rolling average to be applied.

Prop.Name: Number of terms
Prop.Description: Number of terms considered in a rolling average calculation.

Prop.Name: From
Prop.Description: Value from which the difference is calculated.

Prop.Name: As percentage
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the values are expressed as percentages or not.

Prop.Name: UseDomainDescriptions
Prop.Description: Use domain descriptions instead of the actual values from the database.

Depend.Cond: (value(QueryElementVisibility) == Never) or ((value(QueryElementIsFilter) == true) or ((value(QueryElementIsOrderNode) == true) or ((value(QueryElementDataType) != D) and (value(QueryElementDataType) != T))))

(value(QueryElementGroupByYear) == false) and ((value(QueryElementGroupBySemester) == false) and ((value(QueryElementGroupByQuarter) == false) and ((value(QueryElementGroupByMonth) == false) and (value(QueryElementGroupByDayOfWeek) == false))))

Prop.Name: Raise ItemClick event
Prop.Description: True if the item raises the ItemClick event when clicked.

Prop.Name: Output type
Prop.Description: The default output type for the query: Card, Chart, Map, Pivot Table, Table or Default (this last one value is determined based on the structure of the query).

Prop.Name: Title
Prop.Description: Title that will be displayed on top of the query.

Prop.Name: Show values
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the values for the data elements are shown in the chart or not.

Prop.Name: Show data as
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to show the actual values, the values as a percentage of the target values, or both.

Prop.Name: Orientation
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to arrange the attributes horizontally or vertically when more than one data attribute is present.

Prop.Name: Include trend
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include a trend mark for the values or not.

Prop.Name: Trend period
Prop.Description: Specifies the period of time to calculate the trend.

Prop.Name: Include sparkline
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include a sparkline chart for the values or not.

Prop.Name: Include max and min
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include the maximum and minimum values in the series.

Prop.Name: Chart type
Prop.Description: Chart type, when the query is rendered as a chart.

Prop.Name: Plot series
Prop.Description: Specifies if the chart series are plotted together in the same chart or alone in separate charts.

Prop.Name: X axis labels
Prop.Description: Specifies if the labels in the X axis of a chart are shown horizontally, vertically or rotated a certain angle.

Prop.Name: X axis intersection at zero
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the X axis intersects the Y axis at zero or the intersection point is automatically calculated.

Prop.Name: Map type
Prop.Description: Map type, when the query is rendered as a map.

Prop.Name: Region
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the query displays a country, a continent or the entire world map.

Prop.Name: Country
Prop.Description: The country map that will be displayed.

Prop.Name: Continent
Prop.Description: The continent map that will be displayed.

Prop.Name: Paging
Prop.Description: True to specify if the table or pivot table uses paging; False otherwise.

Prop.Name: Page size
Prop.Description: Page size, when Paging is set to True.

Prop.Name: Show data labels in
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the data labels for the data elements in a pivot table are shown in the Columns or Rows area. Only meaningful for two or more data elements.

Prop.Name: Total for rows
Prop.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the rows of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Prop.Name: Total for columns
Prop.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the columns of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatTitle
Prop.Description: Title that will be displayed on top of the chart.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatOutputType
Prop.Description: The default output type for the output format: Card, Chart, Map, Pivot Table, Table or Default (this last one value is determined based on the structure of the query).

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatChartType
Prop.Description: Chart type, when the query is rendered as a chart.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatPaging
Prop.Description: True to specify if the table or pivot table uses paging; False otherwise.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatPageSize
Prop.Description: Page size, when Paging is set to True.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatShowDataLabelsIn
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the data labels for the data elements in a pivot table are shown in the Columns or Rows area. Only meaningful for two or more data elements.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatTotalForRows
Prop.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the rows of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatTotalForColumns
Prop.Description: Determines whether to show a total for the values in the columns of the pivot table. If you set Yes a total will be shown. If you set No the total won't appear at all.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatPlotSeriesOption
Prop.Description: Specifies if the chart series are plotted together in the same chart or alone in separate charts.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatXAxisLabels
Prop.Description: Specifies if the labels in the X axis of a chart are shown horizontally, vertically or rotated a certain angle.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatXAxisIntersectionAtZero
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the X axis intersects the Y axis at zero or the intersection point is automatically calculated.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatShowValues
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the values for the data elements are shown in the chart or not.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatShowDataAs
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to show the actual values, the values as a percentage of the target values, or both.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatOrientation
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to arrange the attributes horizontally or vertically when more than one data attribute is present.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatIncludeTrend
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include a trend mark for the values or not.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatTrendPeriod
Prop.Description: Specifies the period of time to calculate the trend.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatIncludeSparkline
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include a sparkline chart for the values or not.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatIncludeMaxAndMin
Prop.Description: Specifies whether to include the maximum and minimum values in the series.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatMapType
Prop.Description: Map type, when the query is rendered as a map.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatRegion
Prop.Description: Specifies whether the query displays a country, a continent or the entire world map.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatCountry
Prop.Description: The country map that will be displayed.

Prop.Name: QueryOutputFormatContinent
Prop.Description: The continent map that will be displayed.

Depend.Cond: (value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_DATE) or ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_DATETIME) or (not ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == id_DT_BOOLEAN) or ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_GEOPOINT) or (value(QueryParmIsCollection) != true)))))

(value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_DATE) or ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_DATETIME) or (not ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == id_DT_BOOLEAN) or ((value(QueryParameterDataTypeInternal) == DT_GEOPOINT) or (value(QueryParmIsCollection) != true)))))
